tool_description: This API provides detailed information about videos hosted on YouTube. By submitting the URL of a YouTube video, users can retrieve relevant metadata such as title, duration, description, and more.
name: YouTube Video Information Fetcher API
title: YouTube Video Information Fetcher API

api_list.name: Fetch YouTube Video Information
api_list.description:
This endpoint allows users to retrieve detailed metadata about a YouTube video. Submitting the URL of the YouTube video will return relevant information such as title, duration, description, and more.

url (required): The direct link to the YouTube video. The URL should be in the format "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=videoID".
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://youtube-video-information-fetcher-api.p.rapidapi.com/youtube"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "youtube-video-information-fetcher-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://youtube-video-information-fetcher-api.p.rapidapi.com/youtube"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "youtube-video-information-fetcher-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
